name: Midnight Blues
description:
A mysterious detective tracks down two highly-skilled criminals, threatening to turn the NYPD on them if they don't carry out his plans of purging a local crime family. Plans don't always go smoothly. Join them on a path of misery, regret, and violence.

• 20 levels
• 5 playable characters
• 33 weapons
• Synthwave/Darksynth soundtrack by various artists

WARNING: THIS GAME IS RAGE-INDUCING!
